persona.name: John Ramsdell
persona.personality: Inquisitive and knowledgeable, with a strong passion for marine biology and wildlife health, he is analytical and thorough in his approach.
persona.employment: Chief of Harmful Algal Bloom and Analytical Response branch at NOAA
persona.communication_style: Clear and informative, with a focus on scientific clarity and real-world implications, making complex topics accessible.
persona.notes: He has extensive experience in tracking marine animal health issues related to environmental toxins, with particular interest in the long-term effects of harmful algal blooms.
